title: A simple sans-serif font I found on a Spotify cover image
content:
Hi all,

here's a font I found while browsing Spotify. It's a very simple font, but what I like about it is that it's tall, but not too tall.  
I'm looking for any font similar to this because I wanna use it in one of my projects, and I would prefer it to be free.

Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200212im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tO7DkVR_5459.png)

Font: 

 Alternate Gothic 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200212/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: Marin Belec
